name: HxCrush Saga - A match 3 game prototype for HaxeFlixel
name_original: HxCrush Saga - A match 3 game prototype for HaxeFlixel
description:
Here you can find the repository of the game.

I am making 10 simple game prototypes with HaxeFlixel as a fun way to learn! This is the 5th.
